title: How do I transmit a file  via Bluetooth?
answer:
Touch File Manager or Gallery and select a file to be sent.  
Touch and hold the file and touch Share > Bluetooth.  
Open the web browser and access a page. Press ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111114155716.PNG)and touch More > Share page > Bluetooth.  
In Contacts, press![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111114155728.PNG) and touch Import/Export > Share visible contacts > Bluetooth.
